docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 2.--A generally spotty situation was shown in a survey of commercial and business activity for twenty-three foreign markets of the United States during the latter part of April, the Department of Commerce reports.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 2.--A generally spotty situation was shown in a survey of commercial and business activity for twenty-three foreign markets of the United States during the latter part of April, the Department of Commerce reports.
docs.abstract: Survey of 23 countries for latter part of Apr

headline.main: FEW GAINS SHOWN IN TRADE ABROAD; Optimism Noted in Commerce Reports From Six Countries. CANADIAN TEXTILES BETTER Argentina and Japan Have Improvements, but ConditionsGenerally Are Spotty.

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

headline.main: Argentine Team Increases Margin in Meet For the Championship of South America

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 3 (AP).--Argentina clinched the honors today in the seventh annual South American athletic championships, winning five events out of the seven run to bring its point total up to 125. Chile was second with 73 points.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 3 (AP).--Argentina clinched the honors today in the seventh annual South American athletic championships, winning five events out of the seven run to bring its point total up to 125. Chile was second with 73 points.

headline.main: ARGENTINA'S TEAM GAINS TRACK TITLE; Clinches South American Crown With 52-Point Lead Over Chile, 125 to 73. BIANCHILUTTI IS THE STAR Adds 200-Meter Laurels to His 100Meter Title--2 Marks Fall--Meet Ends Tomorrow.
DECATHLON TO ARGENTINE.; Berra Triumphs as South American Championship Meet Ends.

headline.main: ARGENTINA ON GUARD AS TENSION GROWS; Montevideo Hears Troops Have Been Called Out in Capital Because of Unrest. NEWSPAPER IS CLOSED Buenos Aires Anxiously Awaits Word of Decision on Vote Set for Next Wednesday.
